conclusion: Understand how shadows will change when the light source moves to the back right.
The shadow of the cake is currently cast to the right.
The shadow of the toothpick is currently cast to the left.
The shadow of the roll of paper is currently cast to the left.
The shadow of the ring is currently cast to the right.
When the light source moves to the back right, shadows will be cast in the opposite direction.
The shadow of the cake will now be cast to the front left.
The shadow of the toothpick will now be cast to the front left.
The shadow of the roll of paper will now be cast to the front left.
The shadow of the ring will now be cast to the front left.
Shadows will move from their current positions to the front left, and sizes may change slightly.
The shadows A, B, C, and D will all move to the front left when the light source moves to the back right.
